text:
In this lesson, you will learn about electrical signals in the human body. This will help you understand how bionic arms work (like the ones used by Tilly).

Do Now

Working with your classmates, explore the behavior of energy sticks. As a group, your goal is to activate the energy stick (without taking them out of the plastic case).

Answer the questions and provide any observations bellow:

1) How did you and your partners activate the energy stick? Try to come up with at least 3 ways to activate the energy stick.

2) What do you think caused the energy stick to activate? What does that tell us about our body?
In your workspace, answer the following question: How can energy sticks help us understand how Tilly's bionic arms work?
